00024 matrix_ecL_as::matrix_ecL_as (const int N)
00025 {
00026     ecL = new double[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3*N + MATRIX_SIZE_3x3*(N-1)]();
00027 
00028     iQAT = new double[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00029 #ifndef SMPC_VARIABLE_T_h
00030     AiQATiQBiPB = new double[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00031 #endif
00032 }

00035 matrix_ecL_as::~matrix_ecL_as()
00036 {
00037     if (ecL != NULL)
00038         delete ecL;
00039 
00040 #ifndef SMPC_VARIABLE_T_h
00041     if (AiQATiQBiPB != NULL)
00042         delete AiQATiQBiPB;
00043 #endif
00044 
00045     if (iQAT != NULL)
00046         delete iQAT;

00051 
00060 void matrix_ecL_as::chol_dec (double *mx9)
00061 {
00062     // 1st line
00063     mx9[0] = sqrt (mx9[0]);
00064 
00065     // 2nd line
00066     mx9[1] /= mx9[0];
00067     mx9[4] = sqrt(mx9[4] - mx9[1]*mx9[1]); 
00068 
00069     // 3rd line
00070     mx9[2] /= mx9[0]; 
00071     mx9[5] = (mx9[5] - mx9[2]*mx9[1])/mx9[4];
00072     mx9[8] = sqrt(mx9[8] - mx9[5]*mx9[5] - mx9[2]*mx9[2]);
00073 
00074     // These elements must be 0. (but they are never used)
00075 //    mx9[3] = mx9[6] = mx9[7] = 0;
00076 }

00079 
00091 void matrix_ecL_as::form_iQBiPB (const double *B, const double *i2Q, const double i2P, double* result)
00092 {
00093     // diagonal elements
00094     result[0] = i2P * B[0]*B[0] + i2Q[0];
00095     result[4] = i2P * B[1]*B[1] + i2Q[1];
00096     result[8] = i2P * B[2]*B[2] + i2Q[2];
00097 
00098     // symmetric elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00099     result[1] = /*result[3] =*/ i2P * B[0]*B[1];
00100     result[2] = /*result[6] =*/ i2P * B[0]*B[2];
00101     result[5] = /*result[7] =*/ i2P * B[1]*B[2];
00102 }

00105 
00114 void matrix_ecL_as::form_iQAT (const double A3, const double A6, const double *i2Q)
00115 {
00116     iQAT[0] = i2Q[0];
00117     iQAT[1] = A3 * i2Q[1];
00118     iQAT[2] = A6 * i2Q[2];
00119     iQAT[4] = i2Q[1];
00120     iQAT[5] = A3 * i2Q[2];
00121     iQAT[8] = i2Q[2];
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00135 void matrix_ecL_as::form_AiQATiQBiPB (const problem_parameters *ppar, const state_parameters stp, double *result)
00136 {
00137     form_iQBiPB (stp.B, ppar->i2Q, ppar->i2P, result);
00138 
00139     // 1st column
00140     result[0] += iQAT[0] + stp.A3*iQAT[1] + stp.A6*iQAT[2];
00141     result[1] +=                  iQAT[1] + stp.A3*iQAT[2];
00142     result[2] +=                                   iQAT[2];
00143 
00144     // 2nd column
00145     // symmetric elements are not initialized
00146 //    result[3] = iQBiPB[3] + A3*iQAT[4] + A6*iQAT[5];
00147     result[4] += iQAT[4] + stp.A3*iQAT[5];
00148     result[5] +=                  iQAT[5];
00149 
00150     // 3rd column
00151 //    result[6] = iQBiPB[6] + A6*iQAT[8];
00152 //    result[7] = iQBiPB[7] + A3*iQAT[8];
00153     result[8] += iQAT[8];
00154 }

00157 
00165 void matrix_ecL_as::form_L_non_diag(const double *ecLp, double *ecLc)
00166 {
00167     /* L(k+1,k) * L(k,k)' = - inv(Q) * A'
00168      *
00169      * xxx      xxx     xxx
00170      *  xx  *    xx =    xx
00171      *   x        x       x
00172      *
00173      * all matrices are upper triangular
00174      */
00175 
00176     // main diagonal
00177     ecLc[0] = -iQAT[0] / ecLp[0];
00178     ecLc[4] = -iQAT[4] / ecLp[4];
00179     ecLc[8] = -iQAT[8] / ecLp[8];
00180 
00181     // sub-diagonal 1
00182     ecLc[3] = (-iQAT[1] - ecLc[0]*ecLp[1]) / ecLp[4];
00183     ecLc[7] = (-iQAT[5] - ecLc[4]*ecLp[5]) / ecLp[8];
00184 
00185     // sub-diagonal 2
00186     ecLc[6] = (-iQAT[2] - ecLc[0]*ecLp[2] - ecLc[3]*ecLp[5]) / ecLp[8];
00187 }
00188 
00189 
00190 
00201 void matrix_ecL_as::form_L_diag(const double *ecLp, double *ecLc)
00202 {
00203 #ifndef SMPC_VARIABLE_T_h
00204     ecLc[0] = AiQATiQBiPB[0];
00205     ecLc[4] = AiQATiQBiPB[4];
00206     ecLc[8] = AiQATiQBiPB[8];
00207     // symmetric nondiagonal elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00208     ecLc[1] = AiQATiQBiPB[1];
00209     ecLc[2] = AiQATiQBiPB[2];
00210     ecLc[5] = AiQATiQBiPB[5];
00211 #endif
00212 
00213     // L(k+1,k+1) = (- L(k+1,k) * L(k+1,k)') + (A * inv(Q) * A' + inv(Q) + B * inv(P) * B)
00214     // diagonal elements
00215     ecLc[0] -= ecLp[0]*ecLp[0] + ecLp[3]*ecLp[3] + ecLp[6]*ecLp[6];
00216     ecLc[4] -= ecLp[4]*ecLp[4] + ecLp[7]*ecLp[7];
00217     ecLc[8] -= ecLp[8]*ecLp[8];
00218     // symmetric nondiagonal elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00219     ecLc[1] -= /*ecLc[3] =*/ ecLp[3]*ecLp[4] + ecLp[6]*ecLp[7];
00220     ecLc[2] -= /*ecLc[6] =*/ ecLp[6]*ecLp[8];
00221     ecLc[5] -= /*ecLc[7] =*/ ecLp[7]*ecLp[8];
00222 
00223     // chol (L(k+1,k+1))
00224     chol_dec (ecLc);
00225 }

00227 
00228 
00234 void matrix_ecL_as::form (const problem_parameters* ppar)
00235 {
00236     int i;
00237     state_parameters stp;
00238 
00239 
00240     stp = ppar->spar[0];
00241 
00242     // form all matrices
00243 #ifndef SMPC_VARIABLE_T_h
00244     form_iQAT (stp.A3, stp.A6, ppar->i2Q);
00245     form_AiQATiQBiPB (ppar, stp, AiQATiQBiPB);
00246 #endif
00247 
00248     // the first matrix on diagonal
00249     form_iQBiPB (stp.B, ppar->i2Q, ppar->i2P, ecL);
00250     chol_dec (ecL);
00251 
00252 
00253     // offsets
00254     double *ecL_cur = &ecL[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00255     double *ecL_prev = ecL;
00256     for (i = 1; i < ppar->N; i++)
00257     {
00258 #ifdef SMPC_VARIABLE_T_h
00259         stp = ppar->spar[i];
00260         form_iQAT (stp.A3, stp.A6, ppar->i2Q);
00261 #endif
00262 
00263         // form (b), (d), (f) ... 
00264         form_L_non_diag(ecL_prev, ecL_cur);
00265         // update offsets
00266         ecL_cur = &ecL_cur[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00267         ecL_prev = &ecL_prev[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00268 
00269         // form (c), (e), (g) ...
00270 #ifdef SMPC_VARIABLE_T_h
00271         form_AiQATiQBiPB (ppar, stp, ecL_cur);
00272 #endif
00273         form_L_diag(ecL_prev, ecL_cur);
00274         // update offsets
00275         ecL_cur = &ecL_cur[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00276         ecL_prev = &ecL_prev[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00277     }
00278 }

00280 
00288 void matrix_ecL_as::solve_forward(const int N, double *x)
00289 {
00290     int i;
00291     double *xc = x; // 6 current elements of x
00292     double *xp; // 6 elements of x computed on the previous iteration
00293     double *cur_ecL = &ecL[0];  // lower triangular matrix lying on the 
00294                                 // diagonal of L
00295     double *prev_ecL;   // upper triangular matrix lying to the left from
00296                         // cur_ecL at the same level of L
00297 
00298 
00299     // compute the first 6 elements using forward substitution
00300     xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00301     xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00302 
00303     xc[1] -= xc[0] * cur_ecL[1];
00304     xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00305 
00306     xc[4] -= xc[3] * cur_ecL[1];
00307     xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00308 
00309     xc[2] -= xc[0] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[5];
00310     xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00311 
00312     xc[5] -= xc[3] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[5];
00313     xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00314 
00315 
00316     for (i = 1; i < N; i++)
00317     {
00318         // switch to the next level of L / next 6 elements
00319         xp = xc;
00320         xc = &xc[NUM_STATE_VAR];
00321 
00322         prev_ecL = &cur_ecL[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00323         cur_ecL = &cur_ecL[2 * MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00324 
00325 
00326         // update the right part of the equation and compute elements
00327         xc[0] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[0] + xp[1] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[2] * prev_ecL[6];
00328         xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00329 
00330         xc[3] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[0] + xp[4] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[5] * prev_ecL[6];
00331         xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00332 
00333 
00334         xc[1] -= xp[1] * prev_ecL[4] + xp[2] * prev_ecL[7] + xc[0] * cur_ecL[1];
00335         xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00336 
00337         xc[4] -= xp[4] * prev_ecL[4] + xp[5] * prev_ecL[7] + xc[3] * cur_ecL[1];
00338         xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00339 
00340 
00341         xc[2] -= xp[2] * prev_ecL[8] + xc[0] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[5];
00342         xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00343 
00344         xc[5] -= xp[5] * prev_ecL[8] + xc[3] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[5];
00345         xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00349 
00356 void matrix_ecL_as::solve_backward (const int N, double *x)
00357 {
00358     int i;
00359     double *xc = & x[(N-1)*NUM_STATE_VAR]; // current 6 elements of result
00360     double *xp; // 6 elements computed on the previous iteration
00361     
00362     // elements of these matrices accessed as if they were transposed
00363     // lower triangular matrix lying on the diagonal of L
00364     double *cur_ecL = &ecL[2 * (N - 1) * MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00365     // upper triangular matrix lying to the right from cur_ecL at the same level of L'
00366     double *prev_ecL; 
00367 
00368 
00369     // compute the last 6 elements using backward substitution
00370     xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00371     xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00372 
00373     xc[1] -= xc[2] * cur_ecL[5];
00374     xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00375     xc[4] -= xc[5] * cur_ecL[5];
00376     xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00377 
00378     xc[0] -= xc[2] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[1];
00379     xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00380     xc[3] -= xc[5] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[1];
00381     xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00382 
00383 
00384     for (i = N-2; i >= 0 ; i--)
00385     {
00386         xp = xc;
00387         xc = & x[i*NUM_STATE_VAR];
00388 
00389         cur_ecL = &ecL[2 * i * MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00390         prev_ecL = &cur_ecL[MATRIX_SIZE_3x3];
00391 
00392 
00393         // update the right part of the equation and compute elements
00394         xc[2] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[6] + xp[1] * prev_ecL[7] + xp[2] * prev_ecL[8];
00395         xc[2] /= cur_ecL[8];
00396 
00397         xc[5] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[6] + xp[4] * prev_ecL[7] + xp[5] * prev_ecL[8];
00398         xc[5] /= cur_ecL[8];
00399 
00400 
00401         xc[1] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[1] * prev_ecL[4] + xc[2] * cur_ecL[5];
00402         xc[1] /= cur_ecL[4];
00403 
00404         xc[4] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[3] + xp[4] * prev_ecL[4] + xc[5] * cur_ecL[5];
00405         xc[4] /= cur_ecL[4];
00406 
00407 
00408         xc[0] -= xp[0] * prev_ecL[0] + xc[2] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[1] * cur_ecL[1];
00409         xc[0] /= cur_ecL[0];
00410 
00411         xc[3] -= xp[3] * prev_ecL[0] + xc[5] * cur_ecL[2] + xc[4] * cur_ecL[1];
00412         xc[3] /= cur_ecL[0];
00413     }
00414 }
